#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char s[100],a[100];
    int i,n,beg;
    cin>>s;
    n=strlen(s);
    if(n<3)
        cout<<0;
    if(n>=3){
    beg=(n-1)/2;
    for(i=beg-1;i<beg+2;i++)
        a[i]=s[i];
    for(i=beg-1;i<beg+2;i++)
    cout<<a[i];
    }
    return 0;
}
